summary: 1. SLIDING DOORS DO NOT CLOSE AND DOOR KEEPS OPENING AFTER BUTTON IS PUSHED. MULTIPLE ATTEMPTS ARE NEEDED TO SHUT THEM   2. HOOD PAINT BUBBLED   3. TRANSMISSION STICKS FROM SECOND GEAR INTO THIRD. SOMETIMES VERY HARD LIKE YOU ARE BEING REAR ENDED   4. MULTIPLE CYCLINDER WARNINGS FOR MISFIRE. II REPLACED #3 2 WEEKS AGO AND NOW HAVING TO TAKE TO DEALER FOR WARNING ON #6 CYLINDER
